channel.title: Blair Braverman / @BlairBraverman
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @BlairBraverman. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: RT by @BlairBraverman: Spent the afternoon yesterday at the WI State Capitol talking with our representatives about how the overturn of Roe & the trigger law impacts us and other Wisconsinites. I’m grateful to the staffers who met with us and hope our representatives address this injustice immediately.
item.dc:creator: @QuinceMountain
item.description: Spent the afternoon yesterday at the WI State Capitol talking with our representatives about how the overturn of Roe & the trigger law impacts us and other Wisconsinites. I’m grateful to the staffers who met with us and hope our representatives address this injustice immediately.

item.title: R to @esp1371: Just dropping in to share the TL! Miss you all. Sending love from Wisconsin and hope you are doing well ❤️❤️
